name: Cat[ch]
description:
Compete against a friend in this dodgeball-inspired game! Be the most agile and dodge, or catch the ball and shoot it right at your opponent to score !

Get ready and battle to victory in Cat[ch] !

Cat[ch] is a local multiplayer dodgeball game in a universe where ancient rome and futuristic arena meet.

Two players compete in an arena, the first to reach three points wins. 


  • Local multiplayer
  • Xbox controller recommended but PS4 controller also work
  • You can Dash and Jump to dodge the ball
  • You can Catch and Throw the ball
Graph : Léa HOAREAU

Graph : Bruno DAVILA

Graph : Loona PELACUER
Graph : Sal CARLES Graph :  Granlin Dev : Théo CAROUGE
